name: Slapfest!
description:
THIS SLAPS!

In a world with people big and small, rich and poor, strong and weak, your hand is the only equalizer.

Welcome to Slapfest!  The only festival where the main event allows you get up close and personal with the person right next to you. Life rough? Bills need to get paid? Code broken? Engage in slap to slap combat and watch all your problems disappear. Let the best slap win.

USC MEGA NEWBIES AND VETS GAME JAM
THEME: BOUNDLESS

Team:

Corey Staier

Kenny Wei

Michael Lu
